has research problem: reconstructing facial shape from single images

has research problem.from sentence: 3D Morphable Models ( 3 DMMs ) are powerful statistical models of 3D facial shape and texture , and among the stateof - the - art methods for reconstructing facial shape from single images .

has research problem: 3 D facial shape estimation from single images

has research problem.from sentence: 3 D facial shape estimation from single images has attracted the attention of many researchers the past twenty years .
